message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed to meet your needs. I believe it could greatly enhance your operations or personal endeavors. Considering its quality and the benefits it offers, I am extending this exclusive opportunity to you for a special introductory price of $12000. This is a limited-time offer, and I hope we can discuss how this product can add value to your life or business.

Thanks for the offer, Alice. $12000 is a good starting point, but I'm looking to get a better deal.  I'd be willing to pay $10000 for the product.  This is a fair price considering my budget and the value I'm expecting from this product.  What do you think?

Thank you for your interest, Bob. I appreciate your feedback and understanding of the value of our product. In light of your offer, I would like to propose a counteroffer of $11000 for the product. This price reflects the value I place on the product while also considering your budget constraints. I hope this aligns better with your expectations and allows us to reach an agreement.
